explains: n. （浅色背景衬托出的）暗色轮廓；剪影，（尤指人脸的）侧影；（人的）体形，（事物的）形状
v. 把……画成黑色轮廓像，使现出影像（或轮廓）
wordGroup: in silhouette 成剪影；呈现轮廓

sentences.en: The mountains stood out in silhouette.
sentences.cn: 群山的轮廓衬托了出来。

sentences.en: The dark silhouette of the castle ruins stood out boldly against the fading light.
sentences.cn: 城堡遗迹的黑暗轮廓在暗淡光线下显得格外突出。

sentences.en: The dress is fitted to give you a flattering silhouette.
sentences.cn: 穿这件连衣裙，你显得更有身段了。
